japanese: はぁ、はぁ、はぁ……！
translation: Haah, haah, haah!

japanese:
（まったく、親父のやつ！
　何が美味しいバイトを紹介してやる、だ！）
translation:
(Damn it, Dad!
 You have to properly introduce
 what the amazing part-time job is!)

japanese:
（それが今日だとか聞いてねぇよ！
　集合時間ギリギリに走る羽目に
　なってんじゃねぇか！　もっと早く言え！）
translation:
(I didn't hear that it was TODAY!
 Now I have to run to get there just before we meet!
 Tell me sooner, would you?!)

japanese:
はぁ、はぁ、こ、ここで、いいんだよな。
なんとか、間に合った……。
translation:
Haah, haah, th-this is, the place.
It seems, I made it in time...

japanese:
（ここで、一緒に写真を撮るモデルと
　待ち合わせだったよな）
translation:
(I'm supposed to meet a model here
 to take pictures with, I think.)

japanese:
（なんで俺が結婚式場の
　ＰＲ写真のモデルなんて……
　親父はマジで何を考えてるんだ）
translation:
(I don't know why I'd be selected to be the model
 for wedding ceremony hall PR photos...
 Really, what the hell is Dad thinking?)

japanese: （報酬がよくなけりゃ、全力で断ってるところだ）
translation:
(If the pay weren't good,
 I would have refused completely.)

japanese:
（……あれ？　待てよ？
　ということは、相手のモデルが新婦役ってことか？）
translation:
(...Huh? Wait?
 Does that mean that the other model
 is playing the role of the bride?)

japanese:
おはようございまーす。
今日はよろしくお願いします。
translation:
Good morning.
I'm looking forward to today.

japanese:
あ、はい！
おはようございま……す？
translation:
Ah, hello!
Good morn...ing?

japanese: や、フータロー君。
translation: Hey, Futaro-kun.

japanese: あれ？　なんで無反応？
translation: Huh? Why the lack of reaction?

japanese: ヒトチガイデス。
translation: You have me mistaken for the wrong person.

japanese:
いやいや、人違いじゃないでしょ。
君は上杉風太郎君で、バイトのために
ここに来たんでしょ？
translation:
No no, that couldn't be the case.
You are Uesugi Futaro, here to do a part-time job,
right?

japanese: ま、まさか、今日の撮影相手って……。
translation:
I-it couldn't be,
my partner for today's shoot is...

japanese:
はい、当プロダクションに
ご依頼ありがとうございました。
中野一花です、今日はよろしくお願いします。
translation:
Yes, thank you for accepting a role
in today's production. I am Nakano Ichika.
It's a pleasure to be working with you today.

japanese: ……嘘だろ？
translation: Is this some sort of joke?

japanese:
嘘じゃないよ。
正真正銘、ちゃんとしたお仕事。
translation:
It's no joke.
It's authentic, proper work.

japanese:
そんなに驚いてるってことは、
相手が私だって知らなかったの？
translation:
For you to be that surprised,
you didn't know that I would be your partner?

japanese: いま知った……。
translation: I just learned that...

japanese:
あらら～。
まあ、知らない仲でもないんだし、
いきなりでも大丈夫だよね。
translation:
Oh my.
Well, it's not like we don't know each other,
so it's okay that it's a surprise.

japanese: じゃ、現場に行って準備しよっか。
translation: So, why don't we go to the set, and prepare?

japanese: えええええ……。
translation: Whaaaaa...

japanese:
よーし、撮影始めるぞ。
花嫁をバッチリエスコートするんだぞ、風太郎！
translation:
Alright, let's begin the shoot.
Futaro, you'd better escort your bride
with style, now!

japanese: わかってる……。
translation: I understand...

japanese:
（相手が一花だと教えないために
　ギリギリまで黙ってやがったのか。
　終わったら文句言ってやるからな、親父！）
translation:
(Did Dad stay quiet until the last minute so that he
 didn't have to tell me my partner would be Ichika?
 I'm gonna complain when we're finished here, old man!)

japanese: よろしくね、フータロー君。
translation: Here we go, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
どうかな？
ドレス、おかしいところはない？
translation:
I wonder how I look?
My dress doesn't look strange anywhere?

japanese:
い、いや、問題ないだろ。
その、似合ってるし。
translation:
N-no, you look fine.
Um, it looks good on you.

japanese:
えっ……。
本当に？　似合ってる？
translation:
Huh?
Really? It does?

japanese: そう言ったぞ？
translation: That's what I said, right?

japanese:
ありがと。
ふふ、ビックリしちゃった。
フータロー君から言ってくれるなんて。
translation:
Thanks.
Teehee, that surprised me.
For you to say something like that to me, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
おっ！　いい笑顔だ。
そのまま、そのままで１枚もらって――
translation:
Oh! What a good smile!
Let me get that, let me get a shot of that%p-2;――

japanese:
よーし！
次は風太郎との２ショットでいこう。
translation:
Alriiight!
Next, let's do a two shot with Futaro.

japanese:
ええ！？
ど、どんなポーズすりゃいいんだよ。
translation:
Huuuuh?!
Wh-what kind of pose should I do?

japanese:
リラックスして、私の横に並んで。
そして、私と同じ方向に優しく微笑む感じで。
translation:
Relax, and stand beside me.
Then, make a small,
gentle smile looking in the same direction as I am.

japanese: ……わかった。
translation: ...Okay.

japanese:
（さすがプロ、余裕だな。
　ここは一花に任せよう）
translation:
(What a pro. This is no sweat for her.
 I'll leave things to Ichika here.)

japanese:
こういうときは何枚か撮って、いいのを選ぶの。
ゆっくりでいいから少しずつ変化をつけていってね。
translation:
At times like this, many pictures are taken,
and the good ones are selected.
Take your time, and slowly alter things.

japanese:
（やっぱり一花は……
　いつも俺たちの先を歩いているんだな……）
translation:
(Ichika really is...
 always walking ahead of us...)

japanese:
うん、そうそう。
結婚式で緊張してるけど、嬉しさも忘れない感じで。
translation:
Yes, like that.
Act like you're nervous at your wedding,
but don't forget to express happiness.

japanese: 難しい注文だな……。
translation: That's a tough order...

japanese:
じゃあ、たとえば……
誓いの言葉を言うときの気分になってみて。
translation:
Okay, for example...
Try to get in a mood like you're saying your vows.

japanese:
誓いの言葉……。
永遠に愛し続けるって、あれか？
translation:
My vows...
I shall love you, till death do us part, that?

japanese:
そ、そうそう、それ。
私も……愛し……。
translation:
Y-yeah, that.
I too...shall love...

japanese: いいね、もらっとくよ！
translation: Hey, great! You give a hell of a show.

japanese: ありがとうございます。
translation: Thank you very much.

japanese:
よーし、オッケー！
ちょっとカメラチェンジするから休んでてくれ。
translation:
Alright!
I'm gonna change the cameras, so take a short break.

japanese: はい、わかりました。
translation: Okay, understood.

japanese:
それにしても、こういうのは
かなりの量を撮るものなんだな。
translation:
At any rate, this kind of thing
really gets a lot of pictures taken.

japanese:
さては、こうだって決め打ちで１枚撮る、
なんてイメージだった？
translation:
Did you perhaps imagine
that it was just one picture taken at a specific target
or something?

japanese:
そこまでは言わないが……想像以上だ。
しかも、まだ続くんだろ？
translation:
I wouldn't go that far...
but it's more than I imagined.
Also, we'll keep going, right?

japanese:
シーンに合わせて、表情や雰囲気を
色々と検討することもあるし、
コンテ通りに行かない場合もあるからね。
translation:
Depending on the scene, different expressions
and atmospheres are sometimes considered, and sometimes
things don't go according to the storyboard.

japanese:
お父さんがカメラマンなのに、
フータロー君、あまり詳しくないんだ。
translation:
Even though your dad is the photographer, Futaro-kun,
you aren't very familiar with this, are you.

japanese:
家じゃ仕事の話はしないんだよ。
こうやって俺を巻き込むのもめずらしい。
translation:
We don't talk about work at home.
It's rare for me to get involved like this.

japanese:
しかし、相手が知り合いのお前でよかったよ。
それでも隣で圧倒されっぱなしだったが。
やっぱりプロだな、お前は。
translation:
But I'm glad my partner is someone I know,
though I was still overwhelmed standing next to you.
You really are a professional.

japanese: ふふ、ありがと。
translation: Teehee, thanks.

japanese:
でも……まさかね……。
こんな役が回ってくるなんて……。
translation:
But... I couldn't imagine...
That I'd get this role...

japanese: まさかって？
translation: You couldn't imagine it?

japanese:
ん……。
ちょっとさ、タイミングがよすぎるっていうか、
悪すぎるっていうか。
translation:
Hmm...
I guess the timing's a little too good,
or a little too off.

japanese:
……お前の言いたいことはわからないが、
素人の俺にもわかることはある。
translation:
...I don't understand what you're saying,
But there's something I DO understand as an amateur.

japanese: え？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
式場で花嫁がそんな顔をするな。
今お前は、新郎と幸せな結婚式を挙げてるんだぞ？
translation:
The bride shouldn't have a face like that during
the ceremony. You're having a happy wedding
with your groom right now, aren't you?

japanese:
むむむむ～。
素人くんに一本取られるなんて、不覚だ。
translation:
Hmmm.
To have an amateur take a point from me,
what a blunder.

japanese: ふん、プロといえどもまだまだのようだな。
translation: Hmph, seems you've still got some ways to go as a pro.

japanese:
そうだね。
今の私は、みんなに祝福された花嫁。
人生最高の舞台に立ってる。
translation:
That's right.
I am now a bride, blessed by everyone.
I'm standing on the pinnacle of life.

japanese: フータロー君っていう、最愛の人と一緒に。
translation: Together with Futaro-kun, the love of my life.

japanese: そ、そういうこと、だな。
translation: I-I guess that's how it is, huh.

japanese:
今は幸せな花嫁でいいんだ。
今だけは……。
translation:
I'm fine with being a happy bride now.
Just for now...
